text: ayana (allah) akasam nundi niru kuripincaga (endipoyina) selayellu tama tama parimanalaku saripadela pravahimpa sagutayi. Appudu varada (uparitalam mida) nurugulu ubbi vastayi. Mariyu agnini ragilinci nagalu, patralu cesetappudu kuda karigince lohala mida kuda ade vidhanga nurugulu vastayi. I vidhanga allah satyamedo asatyamedo polci vivaristunnadu. Endukante nuruganta egiri potundi, kani manavulaku labhadayakamainadi bhumilo migulutundi. I vidhanga allah udaharanalanu vivaristunnadu
